"Seamless Taskmaster" Teapot: This teapot is designed to help you channel your jealousy into productivity. Its sleek and minimalist design makes it easy to focus on your own tasks, while the built-in timer and reminder system ensures you stay on track. Whenever you see someone else effortlessly completing their tasks, the teapot will subtly vibrate, reminding you to stay motivated and keep going.

"Task Tamer" Teapot: This teapot is inspired by the ancient art of taming wild animals. Its rugged and durable design symbolizes the ability to tame your inner jealousy and channel it into productivity. With a built-in notebook and pen holder, you can jot down notes and ideas as they come to you, ensuring you never miss a moment of inspiration.

"Effortless Elegance" Teapot: This teapot embodies the beauty of seamless efficiency. Its slender and curved design allows it to effortlessly pour tea, while the hidden compartment in the handle stores small items like business cards or notes. Whenever you see someone else completing their tasks with ease, the teapot will subtly glow, inspiring you to strive for similar grace and poise in your own work.

"Motivator" Teapot: This teapot is designed to help you turn your jealousy into fuel for your own productivity. Its unique shape and color scheme are inspired by the motivational posters of the 1970s, with bold graphics and catchy slogans to keep you motivated. Whenever you see someone else finishing their tasks quickly and efficiently, the teapot will emit a subtle scent of citrus and mint, invigorating you to tackle your own tasks with renewed energy and focus.

"Task Tracker" Teapot: This teapot is a high-tech marvel, with a built-in computer and app that allows you to track your progress and set goals for yourself. Whenever you see someone else completing their tasks with ease, the teapot will display a message of encouragement, such as "You got this!" or "Keep going!"
